effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a ackpot! that summons a Greater Dreadstalker at 265% effectiveness. Casting Summon Demonic Tyrant always hits a ackpot!
(4) Set: Casting Hand of Gul'dan causes your active Dreadstalkers to cast Dreadbite at 20% effectiveness. This damage is increased by 10% for each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan.
Set: Your primary demon deals 5% increased damage, and your Shadow Bolt damage is increased by 50%.
(4) Set: Shadow Bolt has a chance to enrage your primary Felguard, increasing the damage of their next Legion Strike by 300%.

spells.description: Use: Reduce the remaining cooldown of your 3 most recently cast spells by 5 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a ackpot! that summons a Greater Dreadstalker at 265% effectiveness. Casting Summon Demonic Tyrant always hits a ackpot!
(4) Set: Casting Hand of Gul'dan causes your active Dreadstalkers to cast Dreadbite at 20% effectiveness. This damage is increased by 10% for each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 75 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 695 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The Core's unstable energies will randomly buff one of your secondary stats for 1,428. This lasts between 10 and 30 sec before randomly changing to another stat.

Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
